title: Alarm for Capital as new Covid-19 cases hit 17,000

title: PTI tally of COVID-19 cases, recoveries and deaths in India at 10.25 pm
description: New Delhi, Apr 14 (PTI) Following is a state/Union Territory-wise tally of COVID-19 cases, active cases, recoveries and deaths in India at 10.25 pm, according to data provided by various governments.

title: India has operationalised over 75,000 Ayushman Bharat-Health and Wellness Centres, says govt
description: Health Minister Harsh Vardhan said over 23.8 crore women have accessed care at these centres till 13 April.

title: India administers over 11 crore COVID vaccines in 89 days; 10 states account for 82% of new cases
description: The cumulative number of coronavirus vaccine doses administered in the country has surged past the 11 crore-mark amid the 'Tika Utsav' or vaccination festival.

title: COVID19: India crosses 26 crore tests, 11 crore vaccinated so far » News Live TV » India
description: In its fight against COVID19 India has achieved a milestone by conducting more than 26 crore tests. The exact figure stands at 26,06,18,866.

title: COVID-19 update: 15-day curfew in Maharashtra; Centre fast-tracks EUA for foreign vaccines - Health News , Firstpost
description: This came after Russia’s Sputnik V vaccine was cleared for restricted emergency use by the Drugs Controller General of India (DCGI) with certain conditions

title: 10 states account for over 80% of new Covid-19 cases
description: Ten states, including Maharashtra, Uttar Pradesh and Delhi, account for 80.80 per cent of fresh Covid-19 cases reported in a day, the Union Health Ministry said on Tuesday as 1,61,736 new infections were registered in 24 hours. The other states in the list of 10 are Chhattisgarh, Gujarat, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, Madhya Pradesh, Rajasthan and Kerala. As India's daily new cases continue to rise, Maharashtra has reported the highest daily new cases at 51,751. It is followed by Uttar Pradesh with 13,604, while Chhattisgarh reported 13,576 new cases, the ministry said.

title: 10 States Account For Over 80% Of New COVID-19 Cases In 24 Hours: Centre
description: Ten states, including Maharashtra, Uttar Pradesh and Delhi, account for 80.80 per cent of fresh COVID-19 cases reported in a day, the Union Health Ministry said today as 1,61,736 new infections were registered in 24 hours.

title: The Number Theory: Where is the second Covid-19 wave bigger than the first?
description: Is the second wave larger than the first everywhere or is that the case only in a few states? Has the rate of testing caught up with this higher second wave? HT analyses Covid-19 data to find out.

title: Gujarat sees highest one-day rise of 6,021 Covid-19 cases, 55 die
description: Of the 55 fatalities, 20 patients died in Ahmedabad district, 19 in Surat, 7 in Vadodara, and 6 in Rajkot.At 1,907, Ahmedabad city reported the highest number of new cases in the state in the last 24 hours

title: Gujarat records 5,469 new COVID-19 cases, a single-day high
description: The death toll due to the virus went up to 4,800 as 54 patients succumbed to the infection during the day.

title: India's cumulative COVID-19 vaccination coverage crosses 10 crore
description: New Delhi [India], April 11 (ANI): The cumulative number of COVID-19 vaccine doses administered in the country crossed 10 crore mark on Sunday with over 35 lakh doses given in the last 24 hours, the Union Health Ministry said.

title: India's COVID-19 vaccination coverage exceeds 9.80 cr mark: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
description: In terms of the number of daily doses administered globally, India continues to remain at the top with an average of 38,93,288 doses administered per day

title: Guj: Record spike of 4,541 COVID-19 cases, new high for A'bad | Health
description: 84 lakh have received the second dose as well.In Dadra Nagar Haveli and Daman  Diu, 41 cases were reported in the last 24 hours, and 21 people recovered, leaving the Union Territory with a caseload of 3,865 and recovery count of 3,624, an official said.With two deaths so far, the number of active cases in the UT is 239, he added.Gujarat COVID-19 figures are as follows Positive cases 3,31,015 new cases 4,541, deaths 4,697, discharged 3,09,626, active cases 22,692 and people tested so far - figures not released.

title: Covid-19: Gujarat records 4,021 new cases, highest single-day spike yet
description: Covid-19 in Gujarat: The daily count surpassed the previous highest one-day rise of 3,575 Covid-19 cases recorded on Wednesday. As many as 35 persons succumbed to the infection in Gujarat in the last 24 hours, taking the death toll to 4,655, said a release by the department.

title: Prohibitory orders issued in Daman, DNH | Surat News - Times of India
description: Prohibitory orders were issued on Tuesday in the union territory of Daman, Diu and Dadra and Nagar Haveli (DNH) in wake of a spike in coronavirus case

title: MP Delkar suicide: Dadra & Nagar Haveli Administrator booked
description: Mumbai Police have booked the Administrator of Union Territory of Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu, Praful K. Patel, in connection with suicide of Dadra & Nagar Haveli MP Mohan Delkar

title: Over 36.7 lakh COVID-19 vaccine doses administered in last 24 hours in India
description: New Delhi [India], April 2 (ANI): A total of 36.7 lakh doses of COVID-19 vaccines were administered in the last 24 hours across India, informed the union health ministry on Friday.

title: COVID-19: 30 athletes test positive at NIS, SAI; No Oly bound sportsperson affected
description: New Delhi [India], March 31 (ANI): Amid the ongoing surge in coronavirus cases, the National Institute of Sports (NIS), Patiala and the Sports Authority of India (SAI), Bengaluru reported 26 and four positive cases respectively.

Gujarat on Tuesday witnessed
2,220 COVID-19 cases, taking the state's tally to 3,05,338,  while the death toll increased by 10 and the recovery count by  1,988, an official said.

title: Gujarat records 2,252 new coronavirus cases, eight deaths in past 24 hours

title: Negative Covid Report Must for Entering Gujarat as State Sees Highest One-day Case Surge
description: The Gujarat government on Saturday announced that a negative COVID-19 RT-PCR test report will be mandatory for those arriving from other states.

title: Kerala logs over 2000 new Covid-19 cases in last 24 hours
description: Kerala on Saturday reported as many as 2,055 new Covid-19 infections, including 25 health workers, taking the total count to 11,15,777.The recovery count of 2,084 cases outnumbered the fresh cases

title: Fresh covid surge puts hospitality industry back under pressure
description: Around 30% hotels and restaurants have not reopened despite the lifting of lockdown curbs, while 20% have shut shop unable to bear losses. Revenue is less than 50% of pre-covid times and footfalls are declining

title: 'Closely monitoring surge in COVID cases, vaccines safe and immunogenic': Harsh Vardhan
description: Priority groups have been identified on the basis of recommendations of the National Expert Group on Vaccine Administration for COVID-19 (NEGVAC), he said.

title: 14 States, UTs report 'zero' COVID-19 deaths in last 24 hours
description: New Delhi [India], March 26 (ANI): Union Health Ministry on Friday informed that 14 States/Union Territories (UTs) have not reported any COVID-19 deaths in the last 24 hours.

description:
Gujarat recorded 1,790 new
coronavirus cases on Wednesday, its highest one-day rise since  the pandemic began, the state health department said.

title: Maharashtra, Punjab and three other states witnessing surge in COVID-19 cases: Union health ministry
description: A total of 275 deaths were reported in a day. Six states account for 83.27 per cent of the new deaths. Maharashtra saw the maximum casualties (132). Punjab follows with 53 daily deaths and Chhattisgarh reported 20 deaths in the last 24 hours.

title: Gujarat bans public celebration of Holi as state records 1,790 new COVID-19 cases
description: As per the notification issued by the home department, public celebrations and mass functions cannot be allowed on the day of Dhuleti on March 29 due to the prevailing pandemic.

title: Odisha: XIMB campus sealed after 28 students, staff test positive for Covid-19

title: Five states account for over 70% of new Covid-19 infections
description: Maharashtra, Punjab, Karnataka, Gujarat and Tamil Nadu continue to report a high number of daily Covid-19 cases, accounting for 71.10 per cent of the 28,903 new infections, the Union Health Ministry said on Wednesday. It said 83.91 per cent of the new cases are from Maharashtra, Punjab, Karnataka, Gujarat and Tamil Nadu and Kerala.

title: Indian Railways will never be privatised, says Union Minister Piyush Goyal
description: Indian Railways will never be privatised, says Union Minister Piyush Goyal - The Railways Minister said the government has increased investment in railways to Rs 2.15 lakh crore in 2021-22 from Rs 1.5 lakh crore in 2019-20.

title: Gujarat: Night curfew in 4 major cities till 31 March as Covid-19 cases surge
